title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with multiple projects and selecting all projects while choosing specific file types, the checkboxes do not indicate any visual feedback or status change during the update process.
EB: The checkboxes should reflect the updating process using a busy cursor or some form of visual indication, providing real-time feedback to the user while the updates are being performed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Initiate the export Zip operation. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose specific file types. 5. Press 'Ok' to start the export process. 6. Observe the lack of visual feedback in the checkboxes during the updating process.
